name: Phone Call
description: Make outbound voice calls via the claude-phone voice server. Supports announce (one-way TTS message) and conversation (two-way AI voice conversation) modes.

voiceServerUrl.description: Base URL of the claude-phone voice server (e.g. http://YOUR_SERVER_LAN_IP:3000)

defaultDevice.description: Default device extension to use for calls (e.g. '12611')

defaultMode.description: Default call mode if not specified in the tool call
